remarks: Transfer lattice join to ` DVecH ` vector space closed subspace join. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2014.)
statement:
djhlj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
djhlj.k $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
djhlj.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhlj.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlj.j $e |- J = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlj $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( I ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) J ( I ` Y ) ) ) $.
